3.13.4.description: Page builder support. Color theme palette integration. Header options available for both posts and pages.

3.12.0.description: Support php 8.1. Migrate theme to Sage version 10. Migrate Carbon fields to the new version. Remove Kernel Scripts. Migrate from webpack to bud.

3.11.0.description: Support php 8. Update global variables and support blade files for php 8.0 version.

3.10.4.description: Fix Localized Google internal fonts. Update link tag correct type in head.

3.10.1.description: Fix: Localize Google Fonts within Template. Fix issue for GDPR of google fonts API.

3.10.0.description: Added support for Korean internationalization `.po` files, KO, thanks to Sangyong Lee.

3.9.2.description: Added a link to the image on the related stories block.

3.9.1.description: Updated the Search drawer markup to allow for filter results.

3.8.0.description: Added the ablity to diable the WPML language menu, and fixed a bug with CarbonFields and ALPS Settings page.

3.7.9.description: HOTFIX: Update ALPS versions if value is empty (fix for Redis)

3.7.8.description: HOTFIX: Adding annother fix for CSS `auto` properties for height and width of images.

3.7.7.description: HOTFIX: Adding CSS `auto` properties for height and width of images.

3.7.6.description: Fix: ALPS Related Pages block was only at 3 columns when the sidebar was hidden. A bug with related stories now showing for certain categories that had different slugs.

3.7.5.description: Fix: Switch related posts sidebar, menu drawer, and widget from using h3's to using divs.

3.7.4.description: Fix: Pulling in the images along with the JS and CSS to the local cache.

3.7.3.description: Fix: Fixing a bug that didn't allow the local cached version of the ALPS CSS/JS to be used on subthemes.

3.7.2.description: HOTFIX: Bug with homepage 3-up grid displays shifting to the right to overlap the Sabbath column.

3.7.1.description: Fixed a bug that didn't pull the latest version of the code.

3.7.0.description: Added local caching of ALPS CDN CSS and Javascript files for performance. Fixed a bug where the related post grid at 3up widths (with hidden sidebar) is shifted wrong on the page.

3.6.6.description: Removing the second copy of jQuery, (2.2.4). This REQUIRES Wordpress 5.6 or higher.

3.6.5.description: Fixed the styling for footnotes, and Footnotes Made Easy. Removed support for Guidepost and replaced it with SimpleTOC.

3.6.4.description: Fixed and updated the German translation.

3.6.3.description: Fixed issue with the html language attributes displaying extra quote marks around them.

3.6.2.description: Adding support for the new ALPS Media Block and fixing issues from the l-grid-item--xxl errors.

3.6.1.description: Fixed an issue with ALPS using the `l-grid-item--xl` classes as `l-grid-item--xxl`

3.6.0.description: Added support for wide logos and the feature header caption on posts.

3.5.15.description: Add RU localization, fixed the `dynamic sidebar`, add the full width  template, fixed the ES translation.

3.5.12.description: Added additional strings to the `.pot` file, bringing in some more files in the `/app` file.

3.5.9.description: Removed `has-dropcap` classes from the single page.

3.5.6.description: Misc cleanup and fixes. Dropcaps, JS, and Nav drawer.

3.5.5.description: Fixed the double-spacing betwen paragraphs on articles and buttons that weren't outlined.

3.5.4.description: Fixed to properly format the localized post date.

3.5.2.description: Adding support for more kadance, gt3-photo-video-gallery, uagb, and kioken blocks.

3.5.1.description: Removing Qubely block support and adding support for two Kadence blocks.

3.5.0.description: ALPS version selector to allow an admin to set the version of ALPS used, including a `latest` option.

3.4.12.description: Fixed: External comment systems not working.

3.4.11.description: Fixed: Custom Logo set with WPML not Showing in 3.4.0 and forward

3.4.10.description: Switched the jquery CDN to Cloudflare's version.

3.4.9.description: Added support for select `gutentor` and `qubely` blocks.

3.4.8.description: Added cache busting for WP css/js.

3.4.7.description: Added checkbox to disable related images, fixed & in categories, post feed label and sabbath column hiding.

3.4.6.description: Added support for a custom field called `schemamarkup`, fixed an issue with `aligncenter` not centering images, CTA buttons on Related pages to include the outlines.

3.4.5.description: Added: Core Table and Core Columns blocks for Gutenberg.

3.4.4.description: Fixed: Schema error and custom meta fields not showing.

3.4.2.description: Fixed: CTA button missing from Full screen hero.

3.4.1.description: Fixed: The theme was missing the `hide-sabbath` class on all instances of the Sabbath column being hidden.

3.4.0.description: Adds custom options for homepage and posts listing pages.

3.3.0.description: Adds the Media Testimonies block and sidebar menu link underlining.

3.2.2.description: Fixed links when the related pages were set to child pages and resolving to the page id and not the freindly url.

3.2.1.description: Fixed an error that broke the gallery.

3.2.0.description: Adding a new full screen option, fixes to the buttons in WP 5.4 and WPML Logos.

3.1.3.description: Added the seperator block and fixed the new theme version notificaitons.

3.1.2.description: Fix: 4-digit Numbers appears on page when adding a 'Footer Logo Icon'

3.1.1.description: Fix for comment form not rendering correctly

3.1.0.description: Added a Hero Carousel slideshow with a maximum number of 6 images.

3.0.34.description: Fixed Guidepost css with the change of the Guidepost plugin.

3.0.33.description: Fixes for footer messages, Guidepost, and the h1 in headers.

3.0.31.description: Fixed the navigation bar covering ALPS elements for logged in users.

3.0.30.description: Removed custom jQuery version. Now it depends on the Wordpress version.

3.0.28.description: Removed requirement for the Gutenberg plugin, shortcodes from expanding in teasers. Added support for the ARVE/NextGenThemes embed block and a License.txt file.

3.0.27-beta.description: Remove requirements for Classic Editor, fixing the version compare, misc fixes.

3.0.26-beta.description: Fixed Theme cache files not working in some hosting.

3.0.25-beta.description: Fixed a bug with the sidebar hiding and 3-up grids.

3.0.21-beta.description: Removing of Piklist and adding support for title, class, etc attributes in the menu system.

3.0.18-beta.description: Adds the shortcode block and a new CTA block.

3.0.17-beta.description: Fixes the footer logo missing when the Sabbath column is hidden.

3.0.16-beta.description: Fixes the breakout block on the wrong grid alignment.

3.0.14-beta.description: Adding dropdown support in the secondary menus, removing hardcoded WPML menu, and fixing the version number.

3.0.13-beta.description: Fixes an issue with the paragraphs block not displaying functioning correctly. This removes the custom block and goes back to the default core paragraphs block.

3.0.12-beta.description: Fixed an issue with i18n phrases not using the correct function.
3.0.12-beta.upgrade_notice: This fixes an issue with the frontend getting a fatal error.

3.0.11-beta.description: Fixed an issue with i18n phrases not using the correct function.
3.0.11-beta.upgrade_notice: This fixes an issue with the frontend getting a fatal error.

3.0.10-beta.upgrade_notice: This is the second beta release. Significant changes have been made between the alpha and beta versions.

3.0.9-beta.description: Significant changes and bug fixes to prepare for the final release. Check the CHANGELOG.md for details.
3.0.9-beta.upgrade_notice: This is the first beta release. Significant changes have been made.

3.0.7-alpha.description: Removing the old wp-updates-theme.php and adding the Kernl theme update code.

3.0.5-alpha.description: Updating the version number to ensure Kernl is working.
